price: Isaan yeroo “Rabbiin malee gabbaramaan dhugaa hin jiru” isaanin jedhamu ni boonu.
arabic: إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُوٓاْ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: innahum kānū idhā qīla lahum lā ilāha illā al-lahu yastakbirūna
